author: __flcl
content: `e**(TARGET_BLOB_GAS_PER_BLOCK / BLOB_BASE_FEE_UPDATE_FRACTION)` is different for the Prague update. How is BLOB_BASE_FEE_UPDATE_FRACTION selected?

author: jtraglia
content:
I would like to merge these three Fulu PRs? Any opposition?

* https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4183
* https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4211
* https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4218

I feel like all have pretty good support & are not controversial.

author: manunlp
content:
For https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4183, should we merge it while the plan is not to use `engine_getBlobsV1` but V2?

> Honest nodes SHOULD query `engine_getBlobsV1` as soon as they receive a valid gossip block that contains data, and import the returned blobs.
